front.title: Quick start guide for populating mobile test devices

author.organization: Information Technology Laboratory (National Institute of Standards and Technology)

front.abstract: This guide provides procedures for documenting and populating various data elements typically found within the contents of a mobile device, e.g., mobile phone, tablet, etc. The guide discusses techniques and considerations for preparing the internal memory of a mobile device for use in testing a mobile forensic tool.

seriesInfo.name: NIST special publication; NIST special pub; NIST SP
